explanation: Most apples are not purple. They are usually red, green, or yellow. See: https://www.usapple.org/all-about-apples/

sentence: We know for certain that there are 21 alive—there’s no debate about that.
There are three more who, unfortunately, it’s doubtful whether they’re alive.
So the one thing we’re certain of is 21; we’re not giving up on any of them.
Not on the remaining three, and not on the others—on all of them.
We want to bring everyone back home.
